name: Erik Battista
description: Technician turned process engineer. Loves optimizing repair flows and making workplace ergonomics effortless. Hates wordy SOPs and poorly tracked inventory.

name: Sarah Salem
description: Personable program manager with technical skills to back it up. Likes to crush bottlenecks and build user-friendly apps. Dislikes clumsy change management.

name: Thomas Kreek
description: Plain-spoken serial entrepreneur with some software chops. Enjoys translating messy operations data into cooking analogies. Avoids large meetings whenever possible.
